control.description-key: Helptext displayer on selection of field in a m-d-a form

property.name: HelpText
property.description-key: The field created on the object table to bind the PCF to - leave blank

property.name: PlaceHolderHeader
property.description-key: Header to be displayed before a field is selected

property.name: PlaceHolderText
property.description-key: Placeholder to be displayed in place of help text

property.name: PublisherPrefix
property.description-key: Publisher prefix for the solution containing the form and helptext entities
